resources.string: 1.Enter the server IP address in xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx format.
2.Enter your tracking ID which will be known to the person who wants to locate your device location.
3.Press the Start Tracking System button to enable this application.
Server IP Address is the IP address of the machine where your location database resides which is in the format as stated above.
Tracking ID is the unique ID which must be known to the person who wants to locate you.
